item.title: Oldschool - 317 - Active pking

item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

dds specz is not allowed on this forum, as you well know. This is the nth time you’ve tried to evade your ban. We know when you post and we’ll keep banning you. Either appeal the ban or stop trying to evade it.

item.title: Oldschool - 317 - Active pking
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

[quote=“Deano one, post:13, topic:449954”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=552852.msg4053567#msg4053567 date=1342737508]

[quote author=Deano one link=topic=552852.msg4053543#msg4053543 date=1342736582]

[quote author=arham 4 link=topic=552852.msg4053268#msg4053268 date=1342716948]

Fix up veng and less power the stupid dds. DDS from a 80 strength hits me, 40 defense, 38-22. Nice…
[/quote]I’m working on the formula’s and yeah dds is too over powered pures running rampage with it, will be fixed soon mmate.

Thank you :). Atleast you still have my luck ;).
EDIT: Again, I get hit 40-33. Tf
[/quote]Fixed it.

No you didn’t. Your combat system sucks. I’m getting hit 30s commonly from a dragon scimitar and 20-30’s from dragon daggers. I’m not playing your server anymore until this is all fixed.
[/quote]Remember your a MAXED pure/main super atk and super str with prayer.

They are 99 str and I am 40 def. I git hit 30’s commonly from d scimmy and always get hit above 50 from ddagger is not normal at all.

I swear i decreased it heaps, its better now, if its not ill lower it even more.[/quote]
i went on it to pk but there was only 4 ppl online who didnt even wanna pk

Read full topic
